product.name: Runner Rug 2x6, Ultra-Thin Entryway Rug Non Slip Washable Rugs for Laundry Room, Runners for Hallways, Vintage Soft Rugs for Living Room, Kitchen, Bedroom(Orange,2'x6')
product.description:
let our rugs add a touch of vitality to your home!
is dedicated to creating a warm and cozy lifestyle. Imagine a home with a exquisite runner rug comes into view when you push the door, then take off your shoes and let our rugs pamper your feet!
We believe that practicality and decoration can be available simultaneously. So we are keep improving to get the most value out of our products, we hope everyone can enjoy a satisfying and memorable shopping experience within a reasonable budget!
Vintage Runner Rug 2x8
Abstract Runner Rug 2x8
Vintage Runner Rug 2x8
Vintage Runner Rug 2x8
Abstract Runner Rug 2x8
Abstract Runner Rug 2x8
Washable Rugs 8x10
product.bullet_points:
• Ultra-thin & Safe Entryway Rug: Our entryway rug is a super cozy crystal pile that is not only super soft, but also fade resistant.The 0.24-inch thick, low-pile runners for hallways is easy to place in entryways and under furniture, and won't block doorways
• Easy To Care Washable Runner Rug: This kitchen rug is machine washable and very easy to care, use vacuum cleaner, broom, or wipe for daily cleaning to prevent dust and crumbs from setting into the fibers. Washer and dryer are also available for laundry room rug. Easily to keep a new looking rug runner
• Safety Non-Slip Hallway Runner: Our kitchen runner non slip washable are made with high quality non-slip TPR latex backing that keeps the rugs for entryway in a stable position, ruggable rugs preventing dangerous movement and slipping, gripping the floor firmly without worrying about slipping, and avoiding scratches on the floor
• Functional Rugs For Entryway: The vintage runner rug non slip is fabulous, which can be perfectly matched with home decorations and accessories, creating a warm appearance. Perfect for various occasions such as in front of the hallways , bathroom, living room, kitchen, bedroom, entrances, patio entryway, pet house, laundry room and so on
• Amazing Design Rug Runner: Our vintage carpet runner decorate your room with a subtle exquisite patterns design, showcases an artful, vintage pattern ruggable that can be seamlessly integrated into a variety of home decor styles. The original design runner rug non slip makes the home unique and special
• TIPS：When the hallway rug arrives, there will be some creases at the beginning, please don't worry, gently smooth them out，flatten the bathroom runner rug on the floor and walk around, the creases on bathroom runner will disappear in a few days
